titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Brooklyn tax document collection 1986.012
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:19:32 +0000.

did.abstract: This collection contains documents relating to Brooklyn taxes and tax collections, including: a tax form for a property transaction on Van Brunt St by W. A. Husted, dated 1864; a tax form for a property transaction on Lawton St. by William Radde, dated 1865; a receipt for A.S. Wheeler for taxes paid on a property transaction, dated 1866; and a petition and an affadavit concerning John B. France's attempt to receive a tax refund, dated 1909.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn tax document collection, 1986.012, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
